title: Higher Moments for Polynomial Chowla
abstract:
Let $\lambda(n)$ be the Liouville function. We study the distribution of
  \[
  \frac{1}{x^{1/2}}\sum_{x\leq n\leq 2x}\lambda(f(n))
  \]
  over random polynomials $f$ of fixed degree $d$ and coefficients bounded in
magnitude by $H$. In particular we prove that the first $d+1$ moments are
Gaussian.
